frontmatter.title: WiiPlay.Space is live!
frontmatter.excerpt: WiiPlay.Space is a blog dedicated to nintendo games, consoles, etc.

pageProps.content:
## What is WiiPlay.Space?

WiiPlay.Space is a blog dedicated to nintendo games, consoles, etc.

I will be making blogs about nintendo games, upcoming releases, homebrew and many more!

## How to contribute?

You can contact me on discord (*Prince527#0520*).
You can also join the *[discord server](https://discord.gg/4SVDyqaTEP)* to contact me.

I accept suggestions for blogs and if you make a blog for WiiPlay.Space, please let me know!
I might add it to the website and you will be credited.

## About me

So I'm Prince527. I'm a programmer, a gamer, etc.
